name: Lost In Abyss (itch) (jamessnntg)
description:
This is a thesis project of 12th Grade Students from Lyceum of Alabang in ICT Strand - Zaanan. The Development and Evaluation of Lost In Abyss: A 2D Metroidvania Game.

 Programmed by James Santiago.

NOTE: THIS IS A HARD DIFFICULTY GAME - BAKA MASTRESS KAYO xd
